# SECURITY ASSESSMENT REPORT
## MCP Server: modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem

---

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

The filesystem MCP server presents **moderate security risks** that require remediation before production deployment. While automated vulnerability scans returned clean results (zero known CVEs, no exposed secrets, no dependency vulnerabilities), static analysis identified 22 findings that warrant serious attention.
